title: Searching for Space Water, with Natalie Starkey - StarTalk All-Stars
description: Water, water everywhere地nd by everywhere, we mean the solar system, our galaxy, and the universe itself. Join us as we search for space water with our host, cosmochemist Natalie Starkey, co-host Chuck Nice, and planetary scientist Lindy Elkins-Tanton.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
content:encoded: Water, water everywhere地nd by everywhere, we mean the solar system, our galaxy, and the universe itself. Join us as we search for space water with our host, cosmochemist Natalie Starkey, co-host Chuck Nice, and planetary scientist Lindy Elkins-Tanton.
